column2: it is never our intention to make people feel rushed and our people are never told or trained to rush people out the door.  We do try to clear tables efficiently
column4: but we know that hovering is annoying and we try to find the right balance.  I suspect that because we were slow
column5: the bussers had little else to do while they waited for the Sunday rush to begin.  Perhaps they were a little over-zealous.  At any rate
column6: my apologies for making you feel rushed.  It was not our intention.
